passages.text:
**clock
Eon is waiting at the train station. @eon_idle_ox
It seems like there is no one else around.
[[Ox|Chills]]
passages.name: Station

passages.text:
**footsteps
She looks towards the sound. @sfx_footsteps @eon_lookAround_ox
A silhouette is approaching her. 
She turns her head away. 
Stranger doesn't stop. 
Footsteps coming closer. 
[[Stranger]]
passages.name: Footsteps

passages.text:
**stranger
She looks again towards the stranger.  @eon_anxious_ox
A silhouette wearing a dark jacket, jeans and sneakers.
Eon: Okay, casual style.
Stranger keeps walking towards her. @sfx_footsteps
She looks away.
[[Hello stranger]]
passages.name: Stranger

passages.text:
**dialog
The footsteps stops next to her. @sfx_footsteps @eon_anxious_ox
With the corner of her eye, she sees the torn out sneakers and the jeans.
The stranger sits down next to her.
Stranger: (text-colour: "red")["Hello stranger."] 
[[Eagle|Hello]]
[[Ox|Get Away]]
passages.name: Hello stranger

passages.text:
**questionMark
Eon: Hello? Can I help you? @eon_anxious_eagle
Stranger: (text-colour: "red")[You can help yourself.]
The stranger's alligator smile grows bigger.
[[Eagle|Why]]
[[Ox |Get Away]]
passages.name: Hello

passages.text:
**exxQuestion
Eon: Why is this dude acting so weird? @eon_scared_ox
She gets up and walks away without saying anything.
[[Ox|Run!]]
passages.name: Get Away

passages.text:
**warning
As she is walking away, she hears their deep voice again.
Stranger: (text-colour: "red")["There is no reason to be scared as long as you prove to be sharp."] @eon_run_ox
Eon starts running towards the exit. @eon_run_ox
[[Ox|Exit Door]]
passages.name: Run!

passages.text:
**exit
The stranger is suddenly at the exit door. @eon_panic_ox
Stranger: (text-colour: "red")["I told you not to be scared."]
[[Ox|Run Again]]
[[Lion|Angry]]
passages.name: Exit Door

passages.text:
**exit
Eon runs towards the other exit as fast as she can. @sfx_shortOfBreath @eon_run_ox
[[Ox|Exit Door]]
passages.name: Run Again

passages.text:
**explosion
Eon: Just fucking let me go! @eon_angry_lion
Stranger: If I were you, I'd listen to me or there would be consequences.
[[Ox|Run Again]]
[[Lion|What]]
passages.name: Angry

passages.text:
**footsteps
Eon gets chills. 
She doesn't like being alone. @eon_anxious_ox
Eon: I wish there was someone waiting with me.
Then she hears footsteps. @sfx_footsteps
[[Footsteps]]
passages.name: Chills

passages.text:
**dialog
Eon: What the fuck you want? @eon_unhappy_lion
Stranger: (text-colour: "red")["I have a riddle for you"]
Eon: What? @eon_confused_lion
Stranger: (text-colour: "red")["A riddle"]
[[Human|What Is A Riddle]]
[[Ox|Ready]]
passages.name: What

passages.text:
**questionMark
Eon: But I don't know what riddle means. @eon_confused_human
Stranger looks confused. 
Stranger: (text-colour: "red")["Are you from fucking Mars? How do you not know what riddles are?"]
Eon: I just don't man, sorry...
Stranger: (text-colour: "red")["Oh man..." ]
Stranger: (text-colour: "red")["Okay, I'll just explain then. It's like a puzzle you solve."]
[[Human|Puzzle]]
[[Ox|Run Again]]
passages.name: What Is A Riddle

passages.text:
**dialog
Eon: Okay tell me... @eon_anxious_ox
The Alligator smile grows bigger.
Stranger: (text-colour: "red")[Okay here it comes...]
[[Ox |Riddle]]
passages.name: Ready

passages.text:
**questionMark
Eon: Okay but what's a puzzle? @eon_sinister_human
Stranger: (text-colour: "red")["What?"]
Eon: I don't know what that means.
Stranger: (text-colour: "red")["Are you fucking kidding me?"]
Eon: Why would I do that?
Stranger: (text-colour: "red")["I'll tell you something and you'll try to guess what I mean!"]
Eon: Oh okay, it's a guessing game. But...
Stranger: (text-colour: "red")["QUIET NOW!"]
[[Human |Riddle]]
passages.name: Puzzle

passages.text:
**riddle
Stranger: (text-colour: "red")[Yes it is. So here it comes:
Stranger: What is something that you get to keep after you give it to someone? Take you time because if you fail, there will be consequences.]
[[Human |Thinking]]
[[Ox |Just think]]
[[Eagle |Think]]
passages.name: Riddle

passages.text:
**think
Eon: Hmm, It can be multiple things.@eon_think_human
[[Ox |Repeat]]
[[ Human |STD]]
[[Eagle |Word]]
passages.name: Thinking

passages.text:
**notAllowed
Eon: Wait a minute! That's just cheating man, not cool. It is my turn to ask you one now! @eon_sinister_human
Stranger:(text-colour: "red")[Your?]
Eon: Yes, it's your turn to guess now.
[[Human |Your turn]]
passages.name: Cheating

passages.text:
**love
Eon thinkis thinking. @eon_anxious_ox
But it is quite hard cause she is hella pressed.
Eon: What is something that you get to keep after giving it?...
// Eon says with a very low voice
Eon: I'm sorry, do you mind repeating the riddle again?
[[Ox |Love]]
passages.name: Repeat

passages.text:
**love
Stranges looks disappointed. He repeats rolling his eyes.
Stranger: (text-colour: "red")[What is something that you get to keep after you give it to someone?]
Eon: Yes yes. I just need to think a little. @eon_think_ox
Eon: It sounds like, hmm, love probably. You gotta have love to be able to give it someone. The more you give, the more you have? I mean, that's what they say...
[[Ox |One more]]
[[Human |STD]]
passages.name: Love

passages.text:
**love
Eon: But what if it is not? There will be consequences he said. @eon_think_ox
The Stranger is playing with his phone. He looks impatient tapping on the floor with this foot.
Eon: What can the consequence be? she asks herself. I guess something bad.
It seems like the stranger is just checking his messages.
Eon: He looks like a normal person. But this is definitely not a normal situation or act.
Stranger: (text-colour: "red")["Ehem! You still there? It's getting late"]
Eon: Yes, just one more minute! 
[[Ox |Answer Love]]
passages.name: One more

passages.text:
**love
Eon: It has to be love, or at least nothing else comes to mind. @eon_anxious_ox
Eon takes a deep breath. And then hesitantly, she speaks her answer.
Eon: Okay, my guess is that it's love.
[[Ox |Love sucks]]
passages.name: Answer Love

passages.text:
**think
Eon feels the tension rising. What kind of consequences she asks with a whisper. @eon_anxious_ox
It is useless to discuss it at this point. Just think.
[[Ox |Repeat]]
passages.name: Just think

passages.text:
**questionMark
What is it that given one, you'll have either two or none? @eon_talk_human
Stranger looks extremly bitter. No more smile.
Think carefully, Eon adds. Remember, there will be consequences.
[[Human |Slowly]]
passages.name: Your turn

passages.text:
**exit
The alligator face is murmuring. 
Stranger: This must be contemporary one...
Eon walks to the Exit door slowly. @eon_walkSlow_human
[[Human |Fool]]
passages.name: Slowly

passages.text:
**warning
The moment she steps by the door step, sirens break out. @eon_scared_human
Alligator dude turns towards Eon. His eyes are burning flames. He looks scary.
Stranger: YOU THINK YOU CAN FOOL ME? ME? 
He starts floating towards her. 
Eon: Oh shit...
[[Ox | Begging]]
[[Eagle |Calm down]]
passages.name: Fool

passages.text:
**cry
Eon: NO!NO! PLEASE DON'T HURT ME! @eon_panic_ox
Stranger: SHOULD I SEND YOU TO TURNIP HELL? SHOULD I?
Eon: Oh God, oh God. Please mister, please forgive me. Please...
Stranger: I'LL SHOW YOU NOW...
The train approaches the station.
[[Ox |Turnip Hell]]
passages.name: Begging

passages.text:
**dialog
Eon: Please calm down, we can figure this out. @eon_anxious_eagle
Stranger: NO! YOU THINK I AM STUPID?
Eon: Not at all! Look, you seem mighty and I was scared okay?
Stranger seems calmer.
Eon: Sorry I did something stupid. But everyone acts stupid sometimes, right?
Stranger: Okay, okay. No worries kid. Well, then we'll skip your riddle and move on to consequences.
[[Eagle |Consequences]]
passages.name: Calm down

passages.text:
**std
Eon is thinking. @eon_think_human
Eon: I feel like STD's fits this definition perfectly. You still keep them after you give it to someone. Dang...
[[Human |Guess STD]]
[[Ox |Repeat]]
passages.name: STD

passages.text:
**thumbDown
Eon: Okay, I think it's STD's @eon_think_human
The stranger looks surprised. 
Stranger:(text-colour: "red")["Ehmm..."]
Eon: What? You give them and still keep them.
Stranger:(text-colour: "red")["I guess that's true"]  (text-colour: "red")["But that was not the answer I expected. So, I'll ask another now."]
[[Human |Cheating]]
passages.name: Guess STD

passages.text:
**thumbDown
Stranger: (text-colour: "red")[oooh, aren't you a sweetheart, it almost breaks my heart.]
Stranger: (text-colour: "red")[But that's just not true. You can totally love and then open up to someone. And lose it afterwards because they are actually a piece of shit!] @eon_surprised_ox
Eon: Argh, sounds like you have some shit going on.
[[Ox |Consequences]]
passages.name: Love sucks

passages.text:
**eyes
Eon is shaking. Holy shit, what's gonna happen now? @eon_panic_ox
Then she hears speakers turned on. 
(text-colour: "red")[TO GET OUT YOU GOTTA EAT THE WHOLE EXIT DOOR. DON'T TRY TO CHEAT, IT WON'T WORK.]
Eon looks back in confusion.
[[Ox |Unexpected]]
[[Eagle |Waiting]]
passages.name: Announcement

passages.text:
**turnip
And that's not what she expected.@eon_surprised_ox
She sees a giant turnip covering the exit door.
Eon: Holy shit, that's definitely a surprise. 
(text-colour: "red")[AND IT'S A BITTER ONE. HAHAHA.]
[[Ox |Bitter]]
passages.name: Unexpected

passages.text:
**turnip
Okay, I can eat turnip. Whatever.
She bites the turnip. @eon_eat_ox @sfx_bite
It is hard, and bitter just like he said.
[[Ox |Bloathing]]
passages.name: Bitter

passages.text:
**turnip
As Eon keeps eating it, her chewing get slower and slower. @eon_eat_ox
She feels her stomach bloathing.
Stranger: Yasss!!! Keep on going! You can do it!!!
[[Ox|Eating]]
passages.name: Bloathing

passages.text:
**turnip
Eon: This is really stupid. I am not trying to get out. I'm waiting to get on my train! @eon_think_eagle
I should just pretend to eat it until my train arrives, which can be any minute. @eon_eat_eagle
(text-colour: "red")[GO AHEAD] Stranger keeps talking.
[[Eagle |Small bite]]
passages.name: Waiting

passages.text:
**turnip
Eon takes a very small bite of the turnip. 
Stranger: (text-colour: "red")[WOW YOU ARE A SLOW EATER]
Eon: Wow I am so full, I think I need a break. @eon_tired_eagle
[[Eagle |Train]]
passages.name: Small bite

passages.text:
**eyes
As she hears the train approaching, she gets back to eating again. @eon_eat_eagle
Stranger: (text-colour: "red")[GOTTA EAT FASTER]
[[Eagle | Train here]]
passages.name: Train

passages.text:
**dialog
Eon: Why do you talk to me like that? What do you want? @eon_confused_eagle
Stranger: (text-colour: "red")[I have a riddle for you. I want you to make a guess. If you guess right, you'll be fine. If not, there will be consequences.]
[[Eagle |Surprise]]
[[Ox |Get Away]]
[[Human |What Is A Riddle]]
passages.name: Why

passages.text:
**dialog
Eon: What if I say no? @eon_think_eagle
Stranger: Then you'll lose by default and face the consequences.
Eon: And what are those?
Stranger: I cannot tell, that's a surprise.
[[Ox |Ready]]
[[Human |What Is A Riddle]]
[[Eagle |Who]]
[[Lion |What]]
passages.name: Surprise

passages.text:
**exxMark
Eon: And may I ask who you are? @eon_confused_eagle
Strangers smile grows deeper.
Stranger: I am the riddle master. I am ancient.
Eon: I think I know who you are.
Stranger: Is that so? Then tell me my name!
[[Eagle |Syphinx]]
passages.name: Who

passages.text:
**syphinx
Eon: I believe you are Syphinx, master of riddles and father of terror. @eon_think_eagle
Stranger: I have to admit, no one called me by that in a very long time. You impressed me gurl. 
Eon: And I guess you'll eat me if I guess incorrectly? @eon_anxious_eagle
Stranger: No, not anymore. I developed reflux over the years. But I have other methods of terror. Anyway, as you know by now there is no other option for you to answer my riddle. Are you ready?
[[Eagle |My Name]]
passages.name: Syphinx

passages.text:
**think
Eon: Interesting... Multiple things come to mind. @eon_think_eagle
[[Ox |Repeat]]
[[ Human |STD]]
[[Eagle |Word]]
passages.name: Think

passages.text:
**word
Eon is thinking. @eon_think_eagle
Eon: It can be an advise or word. But technically you don't need to keep any of those after giving them.
[[Human |STD]]
[[Ox |Repeat]]
[[Eagle |More words]]
passages.name: Word

passages.text:
Eon: This dude must be super old. It makes sense that it's a lame word play. @eon_think_eagle
Eon: Words are expected to be kept. I don't think that's true for advise.
Eon: I'll go for word, that makes the most sense. And he won't be eating me anyway.
[[Eagle |Guess words]]
passages.name: More words

passages.text:
Eon: Okay, here I go. Answer to you riddle is, I believe, word. When you give your word to someone, you get to keep it. @eon_anxious_eagle
The Stranger smiles wide.
[[Eagle |Thank you]]
passages.name: Guess words

passages.text:
Stranger: I am impressed my friend. Really impressed. @eon_happy_eagle
The train is approaching the station finally. @sfx_train
Stranger: You are free to go now. It was a pleasure to challenge you my friend.
[[Eagle | Train]]
passages.name: Thank you

passages.text:
The train arrives.  @eon_hi_eagle
Eon: This was the longest wait I ever had.
She jumps on the train. 
Stranger: Take care my friend!
Eon waves at the stranger as the train took off. @end
passages.name: Train

passages.text:
**blueOrange
~~
Stranger: Thank you for remembering my name. Not many people do anymore. I'd like to present you this rare blue flower as a gift.
Eon picks the blue orange. @eon_approve_eagle
Stranger: Now, it is time for the riddle...
[[Eagle |Riddle]]
passages.name: My Name

passages.text:
**thumbDown
Stranger: (text-colour: "red")[Anyway, you failed! You'll face the consequences.] @eon_anxious_ox
And the stranger disappears, boom!
[[Ox |Announcement ]]
passages.name: Consequences

passages.text:
**dialog
Train arrives at the station finally.
Eon: Okay, sorry but I need to go. I am late. @eon_walk_eagle
Stranger: WHAT? Where do you think you are going?
Eon: To home! I gotto get up early tomorrow.
She calmly walks toward the train. 
[[Eagle|Full]]
passages.name: Train here

passages.text:
**fire
As the doors open, she feels a very intense heat coming from inside. @eon_surprised_eagle
The train is on fire. And full of Turnips. 
Turnips: HELP! HELP IT IS SO HOT IN HERE!
Eon: What the fuck... 
Turnips: PLEASE! WE SHOULDN'T BE ROASTED.
STranger: Hmm, my favorite.
[[Eagle|No train]]
passages.name: Full

passages.text:
**turnip
Stranger: As you see, it's a turnip hell. So, I'd advise not to get on. @eon_scared_eagle
The train takes off with the screaming turnips.
Eon is silent. 
Stranger: So, is your stomach ready yet?
[[Ox|Unexpected]]
passages.name: No train

passages.text:
**turnip
The train stops. Eon hears screams coming from inside. @eon_panic_ox
As the doors open, she feels a very intense heat coming from inside.
The train is on fire. And full of Turnips. 
Turnips: HELP! HELP IT IS SO HOT IN HERE!
Eon: Oh my God, oh my God, OH MY GOD!
Turnips: PLEASE! WE ARE GETTING ROASTED. AND WE ARE TURNIPS!
Stranger: Hmm, delicious!
[[Ox|Last Chance]]
passages.name: Turnip Hell

passages.text:
**cry
Eon: Please mister, please! I'll anything. Please! @eon_panic_ox
Stranger: Well, you have to be more convincing.
Eon: Well I'm not a turnip in the first place.
Turnips: ARGHHH!!!! OUCH!!!
Stranger: Okay, one last chance for you then. But you need to do as I say.
Eon: Anything sir. Anything!
The train takes off.
[[Ox|Your task]]
passages.name: Last Chance

passages.text:
**exxQuestion
Eon is shaking. Holy shit, what's gonna happen now?  @eon_panic_ox
Then she hears speakers turned on. 
(text-colour: "red")[TO GET OUT YOU GOTTA EAT THE WHOLE EXIT DOOR. DON'T TRY TO CHEAT, IT WON'T WORK.]
Eon looks back in confusion. 
[[Ox |Unexpected]]
passages.name: Your task

passages.text:
**turnip
Eon keep eating.@eon_eat_ox
Eating.
Eating.
Eating.
Eating.
Eating.
For hours.
[[Ox|Last bite]]
passages.name: Eating

passages.text:
**tick
And finally it is the last bite. @eon_tired_ox
As she is chewing, she feels her stomach is on fire.
She feels nauseous. 
Confettis explode on top of her head.
Stranger: You did it gurl! Congratulations!
[[Ox|Vomit]]
passages.name: Last bite

passages.text:
**explosion
Eon starts to vomit. Everywhere. @eon_vomit_ox
Stranger: Arghh, this doesn't look good.
She vomits through the door, on the floor, all over herself.
Stranger: Okay, help is on the way!
Ambulance sirens are coming from the railway.
[[Ox|Ambulance]]
passages.name: Vomit

passages.text:
**medPlus
Eon passes out vomiting as the ambulance train arrives. @eon_passedOut_ox
2 turnips come out carrying a stretcher.
Stranger: Hi Danny, hi Bo! Thank you for coming so fast.
They seem annoyed. They lift off Eon and put her on the stretcher.
Danny: Man...You really need to reconsider you way of interacting with people. This can't go on like this.
Stranger: You know, I am ancient. It is not easy to change habits. Still, sorry for the mess. 
Turnips just sigh.
[[Ox|End]]
passages.name: Ambulance

passages.text:
**end
Danny: We'll make sure she makes safely to home. @eon_passedOut_ox
Stranger: Thank you Danny! Bo! See you next time!
As the train takes off Stranger speaks to himself silently.
Stranger: One day, I'll find someone who likes turnips as much as I do. And it is close. I feel it in my bones.
@end
passages.name: End
